sections.heading: intent.It is the intent of the Legislature that all contractors doing business in Nebraska be registered with the department
sections.text: It is not the intent of the Legislature to endorse the quality or performance of services provided by any individual contractor.SourceLaws 1994, LB 248, ยง 2;Laws 2008, LB204,

48-2102.Legislative intent.

It is the intent of the Legislature that all contractors doing business in Nebraska be registered with the department. It is not the intent of the Legislature to endorse the quality or performance of services provided by any individual contractor.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 248, ยง 2;Laws 2008, LB204, ยง 1.
